Specimen Type(s): Non-fastidious Gram-negative and Gram-positive aerobic bacteria
Methodologies: Agar diffusion for Minimum Inhibitory Concentration (MIC) determination
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ETEST Fosfomycin (FO) antimicrobial susceptibility testing strip for MIC determination of fosfomycin in Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria.
Indications for Use Summary: Manual, quantitative technique to determine the MIC of Fosfomycin for non-fastidious Gram-negative and Gram-positive aerobic and fastidious bacteria; specifically for Escherichia coli and Enterococcus faecalis.
